advancements.storage4computercraft:rs_pe: Craft a Refined Storage Peripheral, to access your RS system from ComputerCraft computers
advancements.storage4computercraft:me_pe: Craft an ME Peripheral, to access your ME system from ComputerCraft computers
config.storage4computercraft.rs_peripher: Base RF/t used by the RS Peripheral
RF/t used by the RS Peripheral per connected computer
config.storage4computercraft.me_peripher: Base AE/t used by the ME Peripheral
AE/t used by the ME Peripheral per connected computer
Base number of AE channels consumed by the ME Peripheral
Number of AE channels required for each connected computer
